1.review_notes:
Post-Incident Review - INC0000001

Attendees: Incident Manager, Technical Leads, Account Manager, 7 team members
Duration: 70 minutes

Timeline Review:
- Detection: 2025-09-15T23:02
- Acknowledged: N/A
- Resolved: N/A
- Total Duration: 22 hours

Key Discussion Points:
1. Initial response effectiveness
2. Communication clarity during incident
3. Escalation procedures followed
4. Technical resolution approach
5. Customer impact mitigation

Team Performance: Good response time
1.lessons_learned:
• Root cause analysis completed within SLA. Log analysis identified the underlying issue.
• Cross-team collaboration was seamless. Bridge calls facilitated coordination.
• Escalation to executive level could have been faster. Consider lowering escalation thresholds for P3 incidents.
• Communication protocols worked well. Status updates were provided every 24 minutes to stakeholders.
• Early detection systems proved effective. Monitoring alerts identified the issue within 8 minutes.
1.action_items:
1. Update disaster recovery documentation - Assigned to: Architecture Team - Due: 41 days
2. Implement additional monitoring for API latency - Assigned to: DevOps - Due: 19 days
3. Conduct training session on bridge call protocols - Assigned to: Training Team - Due: 58 days
4. Implement additional monitoring for API latency - Assigned to: DevOps - Due: 19 days
5. Update disaster recovery documentation - Assigned to: Architecture Team - Due: 41 days
6. Implement automated backup verification - Assigned to: Engineering - Due: 60 days
